channel.title: Lost-Realm 718/742 (Come and have lot's of fun)
channel.description:
[b]Lost-Realm is an awesome server, great staff but just low on players. Come and join the server now. It has a lot of bosses that work great including: Nex, Corp and alot more!!! [/b]
The owner of the server is Cash.
Come and join the server here: http://lostrealm718.createaforum.com/index.php
and get started, You can always PM me, my ingame name is "Trachery" i'm on a lot and have quite a lot of experience on the server, i have been playing for over 4 months now and still having alot of fun!
(This is [b]not[/b] a spawn server)
